selections.name: Caramel Slime
selections.reason: Lightly raced filly who dominated last start winning by 2.5 lengths. She has early speed which is crucial at Kawasaki and looks to have significant upside compared to this exposed field.

selections.name: Heavenly Goal
selections.reason: Coming off a win at Kasamatsu and returns to Kawasaki where the stable is confident. Consistent type who should handle this class.

selections.name: My Bridge
selections.reason: Put in a solid effort to finish 2nd last start. Second-up now and should be sharper. Draws well to stalk the pace.

selections.name: High Willhays
selections.reason: Finished mid-pack recently but has shown ability to hit the board in this grade. A logical exotic filler.

danger_horse.name: Heavenly Goal
danger_horse.reason: Arrives in winning form and could easily upset if the top pick regresses.

selections.name: Siena Titicaca
selections.reason: Won last start at this track and distance, showing grit to hold off challengers. Maintains the same weight and jockey combination. The one to beat.

selections.name: Mega Million
selections.reason: Very consistent runner who rarely runs a bad race. Finished 5th last time but was only 2 lengths off the winner. Inside draw helps.

selections.name: Nitto Sunny
selections.reason: Finished 4th last start and has competitive speed figures for this class. Should be in the mix for minor placings.

selections.name: Prompt Noah
selections.reason: Has placed at this distance previously. A bit inconsistent but capable on his day.

danger_horse.name: Mega Million
danger_horse.reason: Consistent veteran who will capitalize if the favorite falters.

selections.name: Filia Summit
selections.reason: Broke maiden impressively last start by 5 lengths. Looks to have found a weak field here and can repeat that performance.

selections.name: Gladsheim
selections.reason: Also a last-start winner who showed good tactical speed. Drawn right next to the top pick, setting up a potential match race.

selections.name: Sayono Max Love
selections.reason: Won last start narrowly. The wide draw is a concern at Kawasaki, but the form is undeniable.

selections.name: C Jam Blues
selections.reason: Another last-start winner in this field of winners. Has speed but faces tougher company today.

danger_horse.name: Gladsheim
danger_horse.reason: Improving type who could easily turn the tables if he gets the jump on the favorite.

selections.name: Bel Leone
selections.reason: Won last start and has been very consistent. The wide draw is less of an issue for a horse with his tactical versatility.

selections.name: Mama Arigato
selections.reason: Finished 3rd last time out and won the start prior. Racing in good form and fits well here.

selections.name: Cotton Flower
selections.reason: Finished 4th recently but won the start before. The rail draw is a huge advantage at Kawasaki if she breaks well.

selections.name: Metal Heart
selections.reason: Solid 4th last time out. A reliable check-getter who adds value to exotics.

danger_horse.name: Cotton Flower
danger_horse.reason: Inside draw could allow her to steal the race if the pace is slow.

selections.name: Atago Tenjin
selections.reason: Dominant winner last start over this sprint distance. Posted a fast time and looks superior to this field.

selections.name: Smokin' Billy
selections.reason: Finished 3rd last time, just behind the leaders. Consistent sprinter who should be right there at the finish.

selections.name: Never End March
selections.reason: Won last start at this track/distance. Steps up slightly but is in peak form.

selections.name: Hi Barbie
selections.reason: Finished 5th last time but was 2nd to Never End March prior. Can bounce back.

danger_horse.name: Smokin' Billy
danger_horse.reason: Has the class to challenge if the favorite gets caught in a speed duel.

selections.name: Gifted Queen
selections.reason: Runner-up last start and a winner prior. Drawn perfectly in barrier 4 to control the race.

selections.name: Engel Lied
selections.reason: Finished 2nd last time out. Showing good improvement and rates as the main danger.

selections.name: Rococo
selections.reason: Finished 6th last time but faced tougher company. Drops into a winnable spot here.

selections.name: Chinon
selections.reason: Solid 4th last start. Consistent type who should be included in wider exotics.

danger_horse.name: Engel Lied
danger_horse.reason: Progressive type who is knocking on the door for a win.

selections.name: Jasmine
selections.reason: Heavily favored in early markets despite a 5th place finish last time. The inside draw and class edge are the key factors.

selections.name: Bel Balt
selections.reason: Finished 5th last time but has shown flashes of ability. In a race with many question marks, consistency counts.

selections.name: Taisei Adamas
selections.reason: Disappointing 10th last time but previous form was better. Can improve.

selections.name: Shingun Armet
selections.reason: Resuming from a break. If ready, fits well in this field.

danger_horse.name: Bel Balt
danger_horse.reason: Could pick up the pieces if the favorite gets trapped on the rail.

selections.name: Kannon Animo
selections.reason: On a three-race winning streak. Loves this sprint distance and is in career-best form. Hard to go against.

selections.name: Tony Prince
selections.reason: Runner-up last time out. Has the speed to overcome the wide draw and challenge late.

selections.name: Tsutsu Uraura
selections.reason: Also coming off a 2nd place finish. Consistent sprinter who hits the board often.

selections.name: Reboot Power
selections.reason: Finished 4th last start. Good inside draw to save ground.

danger_horse.name: Tony Prince
danger_horse.reason: The only horse with recent speed figures close to the favorite.

selections.name: Roaring Flame
selections.reason: Seeking a hat-trick after two consecutive wins. In peak form and looks a class above these.

selections.name: Churat
selections.reason: Won last start by 5 lengths. The wide draw is the only negative, but has the speed to cross.

selections.name: Brave Ruler
selections.reason: Finished 4th last time. Solid performer who draws well.

selections.name: Force Gate
selections.reason: 3rd last time out. Consistent place-getter.

danger_horse.name: Churat
danger_horse.reason: If she clears the field from the outside gate, she could lead all the way.

selections.name: Isana
selections.reason: Resuming but brings superior class lines. If fit, should be too good for this field.

selections.name: Live Mustard
selections.reason: Race-fit and consistent, finishing 3rd last time. The logical alternative to the favorite.

selections.name: Yapushi
selections.reason: 3rd last start. Drawn the rail which is a big plus at the mile distance.

selections.name: Chomechome
selections.reason: 4th last time out. Honest runner who will be grinding away at the finish.

danger_horse.name: Live Mustard
danger_horse.reason: Fitness edge over the favorite could be the deciding factor.

selections.name: Aoi Eagle
selections.reason: Won over this exact track and distance last start. Stays all day and drawn to get the perfect run on the rail.

selections.name: Placebo
selections.reason: Finished 3rd last time. Consistent stayer who will appreciate the distance.

selections.name: Geraldo Barows
selections.reason: 3rd last start. Has the class to feature in the finish.

selections.name: Jo Espoir
selections.reason: Won last start. Steps up in distance but is in winning form.

danger_horse.name: Placebo
danger_horse.reason: Proven stayer who will be running on when others tire.

selections.name: Roll The Bones
selections.reason: Narrowly beaten 2nd last start. In great form and this looks like his race to lose.

selections.name: Soy Latte
selections.reason: Also finished 2nd last time out. Very consistent and pairs well with the top pick for exactas.

selections.name: Pyro De Kiseki
selections.reason: Resuming but has strong back class. Watch betting for fitness clues.

selections.name: Alma Viva
selections.reason: 4th last time. Drawn well on the rail to save ground and hit the board.

danger_horse.name: Soy Latte
danger_horse.reason: Very little separates the top two selections on paper.
